title: Zerbos Health Food Superstore
description: 11,000+ square feet stocking vitamins and supplements, natural foods that are orgainc, gluten free, wheat free, sugar free, also herbal teas, organic fruits and vegetables. Free seminars and events monthly held by doctors, dieticians, and nutritionists. Inside is Harry's Health Bar which offers fresh organic juices, smoothies, veggie sandwiches, salads, and a veg soup daily.
